(G;li40),,274^25TH OCTOBER,. .1940, COPY NO. sT^W.IR CABINET.TII.IE LOST IN AIR RAIDS.Notfl,., "by , the Secretary,. War Cabinet.(Previous reference W,p5(G)(40) 265).The attached Table summarises the information furnished by Departments in respect of the week ending12th October.It should "be explained that the hours lost are expressed as a percentage of the total hours normallyworked, It will ":.s appreciated that, particularly in large Departments, the figures must be based on the best estimate which can he made, e,g;, as regards staff who take work to the shelters or who occupy rooms in whichthey decide to continue, working after the second warning,q this extent the figures are approximate.(Signed) S.E. BRIDGES.Richmond Terrace j 8, /cl25TH OCTOBER, 1940o
